process_steps.title: Plan
process_steps.description: Identify improvement opportunities and define objectives

process_steps.title: Do
process_steps.description: Implement changes on small scale and collect data

process_steps.title: Check
process_steps.description: Analyze results and compare to expected outcomes

process_steps.title: Act
process_steps.description: Standardize successful changes or refine approach

explanatory_text: This PDCA cycle represents our approach to continuous improvement and iterative development. Each phase builds upon the previous one in a repeating pattern.
By maintaining discipline in each phase, we ensure systematic learning and progressive refinement of our processes. Data collection during the Do phase informs objective decision-making.
The cycle repeats continuously, with each iteration incorporating lessons learned and driving incremental improvements across all operational areas.
